程序包的使用
com.buession.springboot.web.security

  • 使用com.buession.springboot.web.security的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    com.buession.springboot.web.security  
    com.buession.springboot.web.security.autoconfigure  
  • com.buession.springboot.web.security使用的com.buession.springboot.web.security中的类 
    类和说明
    HttpSecurityBuilder 
    WebSecurityConfiguration.ContentSecurityPolicy
    Content Security Policy 配置 https://developer.mozilla .org/zh-CN/docs/Web/HTTP/CSP
    WebSecurityConfiguration.Csrf
    Csrf 配置 https://baike.baidu.com/item /跨站请求伪造/13777878
    WebSecurityConfiguration.Csrf.Cookie
    Cookie Csrf Token Repository 配置CookieCsrfTokenRepository
    WebSecurityConfiguration.Csrf.Session
    Cookie Csrf Token Repository 配置HttpSessionCsrfTokenRepository
    WebSecurityConfiguration.FrameOptions
    Frame Options 配置 https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/HTTP/X-Frame-Options
    WebSecurityConfiguration.Hpkp
    Hpkp 配置 https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/HTTP/Public_Key_Pinning
    WebSecurityConfiguration.Hsts
    Hsts 配置 https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/HTTP/HTTP_Strict_Transport_Security
    WebSecurityConfiguration.HttpBasic
    Http Basic 验证 https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/HTTP/Authentication
    WebSecurityConfiguration.ReferrerPolicy
    ReferrerPolicy 配置
    WebSecurityConfiguration.Xss
    XSS 配置 https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/X-XSS-Protection
